src_original: ya idamaparimitāyaḥ |  sūtraṁ likhiṣyānti likhāpayiṣyanti sagatāyuṣo varṣaśatāyuṣo bhaviṣānti ||
oṁ namo bhagavate bhūparimitāya uhāna suviniścita tejorānāyastathāgatoyārhanto samyak sambuddhāya |
tadyathā ||  oṁ puṇya 2 mahāpuṇya aparimitapuṇya aparamitāya puṇya jñānasambhāraupacite ||
oṁ sarvasaskāra pariśraddhāmīte gagaṇasamudragate svabhāvaviśuddhe mahānayaparivāre svāhā || 12 ||
ya idamaparimitāyaḥ sūtraṁ likha-iṣyānti likhāpayiṣyaṁti sana kadācita narakeṣu upayayataṁ na tiryagyonina yamalaukena ca kṣalme papatau na kadācita pratirāpyate ||
yatrayatra janmaye yaśake tatra tatra jātismora bhaviṣyāṁti ||
oṁ namo bhagavate aparimitāya jñāna sāvvinaśa-acitatejorājāyaḥ tathāgatoyārhanto samyaka sambuddhāya ||
oṁ puṇya 2 mahāpuṇya-aparimitapuṇya aparimitāya puṇya (37)  jñāna saṁbhāro pacite ||
oṁ sarva saskāra pariśraddha dhammarmarte gagaṇa samūdagate svabhāva viśuddhe mahānayaparivāre svāhā ||
yaḥ idaṁ maparimitāyaḥ sutraṁ likhiṣyati likha-āpayaṣyaṁti ||
tena catraraśīti dharmma rājikā sahabhrāṇi pratiṣṭhāpitāni bhaviṣyāṁti ||
oṁ namo bhagavate aparimitāya jñāna suviniścita tejo rājāya statha-āgatāya-īnte samyaka samabuddhāya ||
tadyathā |  oṁ puṇya 2 mahāpuṇya arṇarimitāya puṇya jñāna saṁbhāro pavitro ||  oṁ sarva saskāra pariśraddha dharmmate gagaṇa samudragate svabhāva viśūddhe mahānayaparivāre svāhā || 14 ||
yaḥ idaṁ maparimitāyaḥ sūtraṁ la khkhiṣyati likhāpayaṣṭāṁti ||
tatvaṁ parimitāyūḥ sūtraṁ tasya pūṇya skandha sya pramāṇaṁ śakkaṁ gaṇāyi-ū ||
yathā vatvāro mahā samūdra udaka paripūrjña bhaveyū ekaika vindū gaṇayi-u ||
na tvaṁ parimitāyūḥ sutrasa pramāṇaṁ śakka gaṇayi-u |||
oṁ namo bhagavate aparimitāyū jñāna saviniścita tejo rājāyasa tathāgatāya arhante samyaksaṁbuddhāya ||
tadyathā ||  oṁ pūṇya mahāpūṇya aparimitapūṇya aparimitāyū pūṇya jñāna saṁbhārā pacite ||
oṁ sarva saskāra pariśuddha (44)  dharma te gagana samūdrate svabhāva viśuddha mahānaya parivāre svāhā || ||
yaḥ idaṁ ma parimitāyūḥ sūtraṁ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyaṁti satkṛtya pūjayiṣyaṁti ||
te radaśa diśi sarvadikṛ sarva buddha kṣe kṣetreśū sarva tathāgata vanditā pūṇitā śva bhaviṣyati ||
oṁ namo bhagavate aparimitāyū jñāna suviniścita tejo rajāyasa tathāgatāya arhanta samyakamabuddhāya ||
tadyāthā ||  oṁ pūṇya mahāpūṇya aparimitapūṇya aparimitāyū pūṇya hānaṁ saṁbhārāyacitte ||

dānavare na samūdra ta būddhā dāna vasādhigatānana siṁhā dānavase syaca śuyaniṇaṇda kāruṇyakaḥ sya pūre praviśattaṁ ||  śālavane na sūdrata buddhā śālevalādhigatāna siṁhā śālevalesya ca suyatti śabda kā dū śvabhaḥ sya pūre praviśanta ||
gatanalasiṁhṛkṣāntipalesāpaśruyanti śabda kārunikaḥ spavūra pravigantaṁ ||  vīryavalene samaṅgatabuddho vīryya velādhigatānasasiṁha vīryyavastesya vaśruyanti |
